comment: This Zig script initializes config, processes arguments, and sets up a Zig repl environment with JSON parsing and LLM integration.

members.name: main
members.comment: Converts a Zig source code string into a Zig data structure, returning an owned slice.

members.name: printHelp
members.comment: Displays detailed help information for the Zig compiler when a help command is invoked.
